name: Notice.AAA6.ClaimIssue.ClaimFee.Required
titleEn: You need to pay your claim fee
titleCy: Mae angen i chi dalu ffi eich hawliad
descriptionEn: Your claim has not yet been issued, in order to proceed you must pay the claim fee of ${claimFee}. Pay the claim fee.
descriptionCy: Nid yw eich hawliad wedi'i gyhoeddi eto, er mwyn bwrw ymlaen, rhaid i chi dalu ffi’r hawliad o ${claimFee}. Talu ffi’r hawliad.
